A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was a complete disappointment.  It is the weakest plot of any Star Wars movie.  Chasing a Rebel ship the entire movie and leaving Luke Skywalker on a island to milk a space alien is sad and shameful.  Can you image if Leia or Han had to milk the tit of a space alien?  The Canto Bight distraction was a complete waste of time.  Free the space horses and leave the slave children.  Great move.  The Last Jedi is not a Star Wars movie.  It contains a few Star Wars characters and the majority of the movie is a mash of Harry Potter wizardry\, Fast & Furious non-sense\, and Guardians of the Galaxy fragmentation.  The Stars Wars Canon deserves better.
